thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: U.S., North Korea Agree to a Time, Place for Summit, Trump Says

author: Michael C. Bender
title: U.S., North Korea Agree to a Time, Place for Summit, Trump Says
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump said Friday he has agreed to a time and place for his historic summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, but declined to announce the details.
“The trip is being scheduled,” Mr. Trump told reporters before flying to Dallas for a speech to the National Rifle Association. “We now have a date, and we have a location. We’ll be announcing it soon.”
A... RELATED VIDEO First Challenge for the Trump-Kim Summit? Location President Donald Trump is planning to meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in May or June. WSJ’s Gerald F. Seib explains why figuring out where to get together is no simple proposition. Photo: AP
